content:
Colonel Natalia Humeniuk spoke about the goals where the enemy tried to hit the enemy, causing the second consecutive rocket attack on March 22, 2024.

Natalia Humeniuk provided her comments during a live broadcast of the only news.

“The focus of strokes were on the objects of important infrastructure of different like, including energy. Many communities have already been reported that there is a restriction on the use of electricity, there is a need to make water reserves, ”she said.

According to Natalia Humeniuk, the relevant specialists will work further and eliminate all the consequences.

As reported by the Armyinform, the enemy March 22, 2024Drew12 rocket strokes in Zaporizhzhia, as a result of which, in particular, the ZPU was on the verge of blackout.

The second day in a row, Russia causes rocket strokes in Ukraine. On March 21, 2024, an attack on Kiev was massaged, and on March 22, other regional centers and critical infrastructure were under fire.
title: In the defense forces commented the goals of the second in a row of enemy massive missile fire
description: Natalia Humeniuk provided her comments during a live broadcast in the TV.
author: Army Inform
